name: phonebook_backend

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd F:/FullstackOpen/part2/2.6_2.7_2.8_2.9_2.10_2.11_2.12_2.13_2.14_2.15_2.16_2.17 && npm run build && cp -r build F:/FullstackOpen_Part3_SimplePhonebookApp
